Summary: saw three lights dancing in the sky joining seperating rising and falling
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving on 75 south to Cincinnati saw three lights dancing in the sky. Pulled into a McDonalds to view better watched for a minute then they disappeared. Asked someone next to me if they saw it they said no. But many people saw them and reported it. There's a video online of the event. Really had an impact on me psychologically. Looked just like the UFO TV shows you see.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 82 other sightings in cincinnati
There was one other sighting in cincinnati on or around November 1st 2013
